results.name: Number of pairs of consecutive integers x, x+1 such that both are prime(n)-smooth but both are not prime(n-1)-smooth.
comment: See A145605 for a triangle of x value. See A145606 for the largest x for each n.
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Oct 14 2008
